name: New Leads Summary
query:
SELECT
    t.date AS "Date",
    t.assigned_to AS "Assigned To",
    t.new_leads AS "New Leads",
    t.is_total AS "Is Total Row"
FROM (
    -- per assigned user per day
    SELECT 
        DATE(creation) AS date,
        COALESCE(
            JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(_assign, '$[0]')),
            'Unassigned'
        ) AS assigned_to,
        COUNT(name) AS new_leads,
        0 AS is_total
    FROM 
        `tabCRM Lead`
    WHERE
        creation BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
    GROUP BY 
        DATE(creation),
        COALESCE(
            JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(_assign, '$[0]')),
            'Unassigned'
        )

    UNION ALL

    -- daily total (all users)
    SELECT 
        DATE(creation) AS date,
        'TOTAL' AS assigned_to,
        COUNT(name) AS new_leads,
        1 AS is_total
    FROM 
        `tabCRM Lead`
    WHERE
        creation BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
    GROUP BY 
        DATE(creation)
) AS t
ORDER BY 
    t.date ASC,
    t.is_total ASC,
    t.assigned_to ASC;
